extendedInfo.description: The second chapter of the acclaimed run-and-gun action shooting series, "METAL SLUG 2" launches on Android!Thwart General Morden's evil ambition, and uncover the secret of his new coup!!FeaturesâNot only a perfect port of the original NEOGEO game!  In addition to its classic âARCADE MODEâ, this perfect conversion of âMETAL SLUG 2â includes a âMISSION MODEâ, allowing you to select in which stage you want to play!You can now train yourself in your favorite stages or those which give you a hard time! âNew playable characters will assist you on the battlefield!2 female recruits, Eri, a former super agent, and, Fio, the  heir of a military family, join Regular Army's PF Squad Marco and Tarma, in order to put an end to Gen. Morden's dastardly plans. Moreover, you will be supported during your mission by a heroic prisoner who will fight alongside you once freed, and a volunteer who will provide you with bonus items!âUse new weapons and slugs to fight your way through and survive on the battlefield!!The METAL SLUG arsenal expands with the introduction of new weapons such as the "Laser Shot", "Flame Bottles", and new slug vehicles such as the "Slugnoid" (bipedal tank) and the "Slug Flyer" (fighter plane)! The "Camel Slug", a camel equipped with a Vulcan Cannon also awaits in the Desert Stage to help you!!â A control scheme allowing for precise controls!The "Autofire" feature allows you to fire your weapons continuously by holding down the button, you can reposition the buttons outside of the game screen area in "Window mode".Enjoy every corner of METAL SLUG 2 using your own custom controls!âIntense cooperative gameplay via the Bluetooth function!  "METAL SLUG 2â can be doubly enjoyed by playing with another brother-in-arms simultaneously via the Bluetooth function! Will you be able to clear the hardest stages with your friends? âCompatible with âSCORE LOOPâ! Complete the maximum number of âACHIEVEMENTSâ in order to increase your "METAL SLUG 2" Player Rank!Beat the best scores and become Worldâs Number 1!!

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: I\'m a huge Metal Slug fan. The port is... Average. The touch controls are somewhat not as handy as they could (in comparison to NOVA, and other action games). Autofire is far too fast. Menus are just plain ugly... Other than that, well, it\'s Metal Slug :-D
reviews.author: Bogdan Wr\303\263bel

reviews.comment: Fantastic game, brings back great memories, only problem is that it lags too much.. wish it could be fixed soon as I want to play it smoothly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very slow
reviews.comment: Not judging game, but app. After first stage frame rate drops bad, please update/optimize. Judging from other reviews, app has a problem with HTC phones. Slug X just as bad.
reviews.author: Quentin Wance

reviews.title: Mm
reviews.comment: Great game. Fun to play on Samsung nexus s.. but when I down loaded the game on my Samsung s4. It was no good as the controls were to big to use. And could not use the controller
reviews.author: Tomas Mulholland

reviews.title: As good as I remember well almost!
reviews.comment: I would love the game even more if it added ccontroller support some buttons seem to work whereas others don\'t
reviews.author: Jack Crofts

reviews.title: Great Classic but has compatibility issues
reviews.comment: Great Classic but has compatibility issues. Works great on my Moto XOOM tablet... but I\'m having issues on my Huawei Ascend Mate... Sloppy sound and music...
reviews.author: Abdalkarem Al Abawi

reviews.title: C
reviews.comment: Good game but when I start playing the controls don\'t respond please fix this, its getting stressful.....I have the HTC one S
reviews.author: Melquicedec Perez

reviews.title: Fix!
reviews.comment: This version is ok,  but did your metal slug 3!  Won\'t save past level 2! On always stuck with level 2!  One of my favorite game and you guys are doing horrible job!  FIX!
reviews.author: David Seong

reviews.title: Great game, OK port with some control problems
reviews.comment: On my xperia z, the touch zones don\'t respond properly, specifically the movement zone on the left hogs touches that are within other buttons on the right. Its still playable, you just have to ignore where the virtual buttons actually are on the screen and tap further right.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bluetooth support
reviews.comment: Hi I\'m a fan of MS games but I can\'t deal with touch screen controllers. Would you please add compatibility with any Bluetooth controller, I guess physical buttons are more effective to play this game
reviews.author: Rodrigo Aguilar

reviews.title: F$#king Awesome
reviews.comment: Again like I said just the way I remember it... F$#king Sweetness.
reviews.author: Rick Amaro

reviews.title: FIX BUTTON SIZE
reviews.comment: Before I upgraded to my S4 from my old S2 I played this game for hours on end! But now I can not play due to the oversized buttons that can not be downsized!! Please fix this issue so I can start playing again!!!
reviews.author: Timothy W

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: How to use Bluetooth.
reviews.author: rob reyes

reviews.title: Handsome Devil
reviews.comment: Get 2d game controls sometimes slow to respond
reviews.author: sherdrin devine

reviews.title: Hardcore fun
reviews.comment: Excellent retro shooter with stunning graphics. A must buy.
reviews.author: Eleaor F.

reviews.title: Buttons are too big
reviews.comment: Can\'t play because of this. Otherwise great game.
reviews.author: jack inabox

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: This is a very good port of the classic Metal Slug for Android. Enjoying it to the maximum.
reviews.author: Akshay Kumar

reviews.title: Button
reviews.comment: Are you crazy with the size of button? Fix now!
reviews.author: Marco Law

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: It lags it slow  after first mission money back or fix quick
reviews.author: Frank Ventura

reviews.title: Galaxy player 5.0
reviews.comment: I bought it and it didnt open i want my money back
reviews.author: Fabian Contreras
